===Interjection===
{{ja-pos|interjection|なになに}}

# What?, Huh?, What just happened?
# Where is it / are they?,  Where did it/they go?
#*'''何何'''？！僕は札入れを見付けれない！<br>'''''Naninani?!'''  Boku wa satsuire o mitsukerenai!''<br>'''Whaaat?!'''  I can't find my wallet!

====Usage notes====
Similar to the interjection sense of [[あれ#Interjection|あれ]] (Etymology 3).
